description: 監禁 少女 運命 ？ 犯人 内 秘め 想像 絶する 人格 ？ 女子高生 ケイシー （ アニヤ・テイラー ＝ ジョイ ） 級友 クレア （ ヘイリー・ルー・リチャードソン ） バースデー パーティー 招か 帰り クレア 親友 マルシア （ ジェシカ スーラ ） 家 車 送っ もらう 悲劇 始まり 見知らぬ 男 車 乗り込ん 3人 眠らさ 拉致 … 目覚める 殺風景 密室 ドア 開け 入っ 男 神経質 雰囲気 漂わ このまま 命 危ない ―― どう すれ 逃げ ？ 3人 頭 ひねっ 矢先 扉 向こう さっき 男 女性 声 聞こえる 助け 叫ぶ 少女 姿 現し … 女性 洋服 着 女性 口調 話す 男 大丈夫 あなた 手 出し わ 絶句 少女 今度 屈託 僕 9歳 よ 男 話 かけ 実は 23人 人格 持ち DID ＜ 解離性同一性障害 ＞ 精神医学 専門 女医 フレッチャー （ ベティ・バックリー ） セラピー 受け 密室 3人 女子高生 VS 23人 人格 熾烈 攻防 繰り広げ 中 もう ひとり 24人 目 人格 存在 生まれよ ― 果たして 彼女たち 脱出 ？.

Split was directed by M Night Shyamalan and stars James McAvoy as a man who has 23 personalities inside himself and kidnaps and imprisons 3 teenage girls in an isolated underground facility where they attempt to get out of there with a help from the guy who claims to be a nine year old boy and confides that the girls will be sacrificed to The Beast that is a rumoured 24t h personality. I d waited for this film to be released at theatres in Japan since it came out in the US The punchlines of his films are always very unexpected and make us really focus on each of his film till the end in order not to miss out any part to expect how they re gonna come to an end but still beyond our expectations I actually had expected that Split would end like in the way The Sixths Sense or Unbreakable does However I couldn t expect that he d already created a new way to make the film end which was actually used in Split So what I wanna say is that this was totally different from his previous works and again it blew me away in the end Just realised that we can never expect how his films end There is one thing that I have to warn those wh o's gonna see this is that better watch some of his previous films especially Unbreakable before going see Split Without any preparations for this it might be impossible for you to understand the plot and you would end up reading an explanation to fully understand on Wiki or something like that after getting ho me. To avoid that sort of stuff please at least watch one of his previous ones Unbreakable released in 2000 and stars Bruce Wills and Samuel L Jackson Anyway Thanks for reading my review of Split "..

James McAvoy OMG I had no idea that he was this capable as an actor This movie really shows that McAvoy is a real talent to look out for His facial expressions and vocal tones switch with each person that he has to play. Props to M Night Shyamalan too for coming back to glory with what he is most great for doing Horror and thriller This man really is a great director when it comes to creating suspense His style is all over this movie. Through McAvoy s versatile acting and Sh yam ala n's eye for creating non stop tension their is an excellent movie to be seen here The story what seems a little mysterious at first unveils as the story moves along and every scene is framed very well. Anya Taylor Joy is another talent that really shines in this movie Her backstory also plays out as the film progresses and it was really intriguing to see her have to face off with McAvoy. Shyamalan fans will not be disappointed by this one This is easily one of his best movies in the last few years.
